enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 103-CN.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
title: SCS CHEM 123-CN-100 General Physical Chemistry Laboratory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is the laboratory course associated with CHEM 103-CN General Physical Chemistry. In the course, chemistry laboratory techniques are applied to biosensor technology using concepts of acid-base chemistry, kinetics, and the like. The design of a biosensor is covered as well. The course includes planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on these experiments. Credit for this course is 0.34 units. Enrollment is concurrent with CHEM 103-CN.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Grade of C- or higher in CHEM 102 or equivalent course, or consent of instructor.

subject: CHEM
